skills.description: Here you can see some technologies that I've more affinity. As I evolve and remeber others, I'll adding them to this list.

experience.octadesk: Building a chat widget that connects with other company projects. Helping other squads by fixing their bugs. Working on a mobile/desktop app chat application.
experience.ambevTech: I started to develop a platform to connect, manage and tracking several DevOps features from Azure and others
